title: The Punjab Laws Act, 1872

title: The Bharatiya Sakshya Adhiniyam, 2023

description: Validates land reform laws in Bihar concerning mines and minerals.

title: The Explosives Act, 1884

description: Specifies residence requirements for public employment eligibility.

title: The Suits Valuation Act, 1887

description: Regulates the storage, transport, and handling of inflammable substances.

title: The Environment (Protection) Act, 1986
